means.word_mean: 1. worn or shabby from overuse or (of pages) from having corners turned down;

sentences.sentence: "a somewhat dog-eared duke...a bit run down"-Clifton Fadiman

means.word_mean: 2. having ears (or appendages resembling ears) or having ears of a specified kind; often used in combination
